Uses of Class
moj.ri.weighting.WeightingScheme

Packages that use WeightingScheme
moj.ri   
moj.ri.weighting   
 

Uses of WeightingScheme in moj.ri
 

Methods in moj.ri that return WeightingScheme
 WeightingScheme RandomIndex.getWeightingScheme()
          Gets the name (class) of the WeightingScheme used by the RandomIndex when updating context labels in RandonLabels in the RandomIndex.
 

Methods in moj.ri with parameters of type WeightingScheme
 boolean RandomLabel.updateContext(RandomLabel[] leftContext, RandomLabel[] rightContext, WeightingScheme weightingScheme)
          Update this RandomLabel's context with the weighted labels of the RandomLabels in left and right context using the supplied weighting scheme (as defined by a visiting object weightingScheme).
 

Constructors in moj.ri with parameters of type WeightingScheme
RandomIndex(int dimensionality, int randomDegree, int seed, int leftWindowSize, int rightWindowSize, WeightingScheme weightingScheme)
          Create a new RandomIndex of RandomLabels with the given dimensionality, degree of initial randomness and window size for contextual updates.
SparseDistributedMemory(int dimensionality, int randomDegree, int seed, int leftWindowSize, int rightWindowSize, WeightingScheme weightingScheme)
          Create a new SparseDistributedMemory of RandomLabels with the given dimensionality, degree of initial randomness and window size for contextual updates.
 

Uses of WeightingScheme in moj.ri.weighting
 

Subclasses of WeightingScheme in moj.ri.weighting
 class MangesWS
          Calculates the weighting based upon the distance to the current label in the following manner: weight=(2^(1-distance to focus word)).
 class MartinsWCWS
          Calculates the weighting based upon the distance to the current label in the following manner: weight=(1/distance to focus word) but also gives a higher weight to content words.
 class MartinsWS
          Calculates the weighting based upon the distance to the current label in the following manner: weight=(1/distance to focus word)
 class RosellsWS
          ((1-c) + c*sim) * 2^(1-d)
